title: Heuristic-Based Experiential Learning for Developing Science Inquiry Lesson Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science curriculum instruction experience and mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A corporate job training program designed to strengthen competencies in designing and implementing actual science inquiry lessons, requiring optimized mobile learning design in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can develop three or more science inquiry lesson design strategies using heuristic approaches.
Participants can practice two or more experiential learning activities in mobile-based microlearning environments and incorporate feedback.
Participants can complete real science inquiry lesson designs through project-based assessments and conduct peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
